name: Love Letter Game
description:
A love letter needs to find who it is addressed to.

AudreyMaybe and I made this for the Mini Jam 43: Travel, the limitation was a main character what was weaker than everything else in the world. 

music: https://patrickdearteaga.com/arcade-music/, song title is Friends

INSTRUCTIONS

The paper plane will follow your mouse, it will also travel faster when going down and slower going up. Avoid any obstacles in the world and head to the other person. Have fun!
